Package uintTesting

Class Roster

java.lang.Object
uintTesting.Roster
public class Roster
extends java.lang.Object
The Roster class will hold a list of students and let the user manipulate the list with methods
Author:
Isaac Brukhman

  • Field Details

    • roster

      private Student[] roster

    • size

      private int size

  • Constructor Details

    • Roster

      public Roster()

  • Method Details

    • find

      private int find​(Student student)
      Find will linearly search through the roster and return the index if found. If not -1 is returned.
      Parameters:
      student - takes in an Student to check if it's in our roster
      Returns:
      index that's index of Student if found, -1 otherwise

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Grow will initiate the size by 4 and will increase roster's capacity by 4 after initialization.

    • add

      public boolean add​(Student student)
      Add will look for an open spot and put the new Student in. If no spot is found, grow() and add the Student to the array
      Parameters:
      student - that we're trying to add to the roster
      Returns:
      boolean true if added, false if duplicate

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(Student student)
      Remove will shift the array forward from the index of the Student that will be removed.
      Parameters:
      student - that we're trying to remove from the roster
      Returns:
      boolean true if removes, false if can't find the Student

    • findStudent

      public Student findStudent​(Student newStudent)
      gets the student that we are looking for
      Parameters:
      newStudent - a student with the same Major and name
      Returns:
      Student the student in the roster

    • calculateTuition

      public void calculateTuition()
      Calculated tuition for the whole roster

    • pay

      public boolean pay​(Student student, double amount, Date date)
      Tries to pay the students tuition and give a timestamp.
      Parameters:
      student - that we want to find
      amount - that the student will pay
      date - the date that payment was attempted
      Returns:
      true if th payment was less than 10000

    • setFinancialAid

      public boolean setFinancialAid​(Student student, double amount)
      sets the financial aid of the student to the amount
      Parameters:
      student - that need financial aid
      amount - that will be aided
      Returns:
      false if the student isn't eligible or the amount is wrong

    • setStudyAbroad

      public boolean setStudyAbroad​(Student student, boolean abroadState)
      Set the abroad status to the inputed value if the student is international
      Parameters:
      student - the international student we want to flip the
      abroadState - if the student is studying abroad
      Returns:
      false if the student was not found or if the credits were more than 12

    • print

      public void print()
      print, prints the whole roster sorted by index.

    • printByName

      public void printByName()
      printByName will sort roster alphabetically and then print

    • printByTuition

      public void printByTuition()
      printByTuition will find all the students that paid and sort them by last payment date. Prints the resulting list
